thread.title: MoneyOnMobile Rights Offering Reminder to Contact your Financial Advisor

author: cnbc.com
title: MoneyOnMobile Rights Offering Reminder to Contact your Financial Advisor
text:
DALLAS and MUMBAI, India, May 30, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- MoneyOnMobile, Inc. (OTCQB: MOMT) reminds its right holders to contact their financial advisor in regards to the timing and procedures for exercising your subscription rights, as all broker dealers have different cut off dates and times for processing subscriptions in advance of June 6 th .
"We are excited to offer our shareholders the opportunity to protect and even increase their ownership during the current subscription period which expires on June 6th. If the offering is successful, we expect to meet the requirements for a listing on the Nasdaq, which is a condition to closing the offering, which means, at closing, investors will receive newly issued and freely tradable shares in a Nasdaq listed company. If we are unsuccessful in uplisting to Nasdaq, the funds will be returned to investors," remarked Harold Montgomery.
As a reminder, this right offering allows its shareholders the opportunity to maintain or increase their respective ownership in the company by exercising their subscription rights for $6 per share. MoneyOnMobile distributed to its shareholders of record non-transferable subscription rights to purchase one share of MoneyOnMobile common stock for each share of common stock held or common stock issuable upon conversion of preferred stock held at 4:00 p.m., Eastern Time, on May 11, 2018. Holders who fully exercise their basic subscription privilege will be entitled to purchase additional shares of common stock via the over-subscription privilege (should any of the offering remain unsubscribed at the expiration of the subscription period). This rights offering shall not exceed $10 million (approximately 1,666,667 million shares of Common stock) and be no less than $4 million (approximately 666,667 shares).
Calendar for 2018 rights offering:
Wednesday, May 16 Subscription Period Began
Wednesday, June 6 Subscription Period Ends by 5:00 PM ET
Details of the rights offering are set out in the registration statement on Form S-1/A, as amended, file number 333-223935 filed with the SEC, which is available on the SEC's website at: http://bit.ly/MOMTsecEDGAR
MoneyOnMobile intends to use the net proceeds from the rights offering to provide working capital to expand growth in India and for general corporate purposes.
MoneyOnMobile has engaged Advisory Group Equity Services, Ltd. doing business as RHK Capital as Dealer-Manager in the offering, Mackenzie Partners, Inc. as Information Agent and Securities Transfer Corporation as Subscription Agent. Questions about the rights offering or requests for copies of the prospectus, when available, may be directed to Mackenzie Partners at (800)322-2885 or rightsoffer@mackenziepartners.com
About MoneyOnMobile, Inc.
MoneyOnMobile, Inc. is an India focused mobile payments technology and processing company offering mobile payment services. MoneyOnMobile enables Indian consumers to use mobile phones to pay for goods and services or transfer funds from one cell phone to another. It can be used as simple SMS text functionality or through the MoneyOnMobile application or internet site. MoneyOnMobile has more than 350,000 retail locations throughout India.
